website_summaries.verdict: This is the ultimate polo for an athlete that wants something that can stand up to sweat, remain comfortable, and maintain quality.
pros: This short-sleeved polo washes well and doesn’t stain easily, made of fabric that wicks moisture, and is ideal for athletes to enjoy
Comfortable fit and made of thick and durable fabric without feeling heavy while worn

customer_reviews.title: Collar frays
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this shirt I washed it for my husband, he wore it once, I washed it again and now the collar is fraying. I would expect that from a Walmart shirt... not a 60$ Under Armour
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Polo_ fits streamline..for the athelete
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Polo Shirt, after so many on line reviews I decided to buy this shirt , it fits very true to size no extra room so it does trim line your silhouette it has no extra material to be a relaxed fit Washes really well... however it does stain easily so if you sweat on the court or on the course be cautious of white as I noticed after the summer sports , the material yellows around the collar or arm pits after the 8-10th wash, This is definitely an active sports shirt for wearing , if you are looking for a relaxed summer polo to wear out to a restaurant _ suggest an Orvis sea wash shirt
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M. Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt, but it's a snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased about 10 shirts for my sales staff. The quality and price were excellent. In my opinion though, it is a slightly slimmer fit for men. My sales staff would have preferred one size larger for all of the shirts I purchased. I happened to purchase an XXXL for one individual who normally wears a XXL. He was the only one who was very pleased with the fit of the shirt. The rest of my staff had shirts according to their preferred sizes, and they all felt their shirts were snug.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of UA products and I’ve never had a problem. I washed this shirt and the stitching was already coming loose on the shoulder area. I don’t know if it was defective, as I didn’t look at it before I washed it. I’ve never needed to look at a UA product that I know fits. Learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, and cool in this southern humid heat.
customer_reviews.text: I'm tall but not large. Most shirts are baggy (XL), or too short(LRG). The large tall fits perfect. I'm 6'1" 175lbs. The only drawback is, its necessary to cold wash by itself, a quick 5 minute tumble in the dryer to knock out the wrinkles then hang dry. This is necessary to keep this shirt and others like it looking new.
customer_reviews.author: jack of trades

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is definitely really good quality! It fits as expected. I am 6'3", I am happy with the length. The shirt order arrived on time. I will definitely buy from this seller again in the future! It was happy with the packaging too! It was wrapped in a sealed plastic bag and the box was rigid also!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G.

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt...
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice shirt and nice color. Fits like it should...slightly loose. But overall good fit. Quality is decent but UA is getting cheaper quality...the collar is not cut or sewn perfectly and thread quality isn't quality isn't what it once was. Less of performance pool than I thought...hence my loose fit comment
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Collar Corners Already Fraying !!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt but the corners of the collar started to fray after a couple of washings, I own a lot of Under Armour clothing and this is the first item I have had an issue with but for $40.00 this shouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Brad D

customer_reviews.title: Step your game up
customer_reviews.text: So I order two different color under armor golf shirts and they somehow send me two of same color, so I contact them and say I would like to return one and get a different color and these idiots send me another two of same color!!!!! This is really getting annoying, also the quality is poor and I’m now doubting its real under armor, it’s uncomfortable and more twilly than soft. Not a happy customer and I wish I could say this is the first problem I’ve had with amazon it seems they are selling a lot of crap with terrible customer service, donthey even have people reading or able to comprehend the reviews and problems?
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt! I bought my husband this shirt for Father's Day and a matching onesie of this exact shirt for our baby boy. This is really good quality but I expected nothing less with an Under Armour product. Definitely would recommend this polo shirt to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: TPowers00

customer_reviews.title: More like an extra-large size
customer_reviews.text: Previously had purchased the same style/model but in a different color and was hoping for the same, just in this different color. Yet this material was thinner, and the shirt was bigger and hung too loose. More like an extra-large size.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rabideaux

customer_reviews.title: Good short. It is the lessor quality or chevy ...
customer_reviews.text: Good short. It is the lessor quality or chevy line as I like to call it you'd see at an outlet mall. You can tell by the thickness and how much it does not unwrinkled. The price is right for a casual polo, however I always believe in you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Haigh

customer_reviews.title: Once full-size smaller and does acquire snags!
customer_reviews.text: One full size smaller than normal, this material tends to have a little snag problem when you get it wrapped up on stuff .
customer_reviews.author: Machado

customer_reviews.title: Great travel polo
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a travel polo that's easy care and doesn't wrinkle. The fit is one that isn't too tight or too baggy for my 175lbs 5'9" athletic built body. Fabric's right, not too heavy nor too thin. I did feel a bit warm at times so wouldn't recommend for hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Just what expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend who wears these kinds of Under Armour shirts a lot. Nice, normal color. Fit and fabric were good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable quality golf shirt
customer_reviews.text: Quality sweat-wicking polo, good weight and solid material for heat-battling on the golf course. Sometimes sweat-wicking polos look "cheap" or flimsy. Under armour keeps it looking professional (even in the white fabric).
customer_reviews.author: UB

customer_reviews.title: Best Under Armour Polo
customer_reviews.text: These Polos are very confortable, I got a bigger size because I like how it fits ( not too loose, not to tight. I also the quality of the materiales and that the Under Armor logo and letters in the back are embroidered.
customer_reviews.author: Jet-Pilot

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite shirts
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Perfect fit and the color pops! I love wearing this shirt because of all the compliments I receive.
customer_reviews.author: Achill

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable! I love the way it fits
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable! I love the way it fits, and after a few washes and dries, it stayed the same. Definitely recommend this! I love Under Armor. Will most likely purchase different Polo's from them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf or the office
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Washes well. My husband has had some of these shirts for years and they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Biggane

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is exactly what was expected. It's a lightweight, moisture wicking polo shirt.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hite

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: Overall I can't complain. I'm 6 foot 4, and I went with an XL. It's a little baggy. But I probably had no choice but to go XL for the length. Nice shirt.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Product perform well a little hard to separate
customer_reviews.text: Product perform well a little hard to separate the paper fo=rom the pad. Needed a razor blade then worked great
customer_reviews.author: arnie rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: The shirt looks and fits great. The seam across the shoulders doesn't move with ...
customer_reviews.text: The shirt looks and fits great. The seam across the shoulders doesn't move with you quite, like a shirt with no seam. It doesn't fit badly, but I do notice it, when I wear this shirt. I lift weights and have broad shoulders, so your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Cypherpunk

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but not super good. I had one before exactly same and it was super comfortable but this one is not as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Quality shirt!
customer_reviews.text: The performance polo fits great and has an embroidered under armour logo. It beats the performance polo 2 by a mile with its stamped on logo.
customer_reviews.author: Princesstiana

customer_reviews.title: Husband was a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, but I thought the under armor logo and wording was navy blue. It’s black.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt. Liked the first one I bought so much that I bought another
customer_reviews.text: Great shirts. I purchase it in two different colors. A little snug in the arms at first but loosens just a bit after it's worn a few times. If your relatively in decent shape this shirt will look great. If your not , it won't.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Own several UA polos and this one is horrible. Not wrinkle free and the seem is began unraveling after first use. Not sure if this was a bad quality control or a knockoff but beware.
customer_reviews.author: David Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Great thing about this is that you don't need to iron. Great for summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sean_Ford

customer_reviews.title: Wish that UA made more Tall sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great style. A perfect polo, I just wish they had more colors available in Tall sizes.
customer_reviews.author: A Curious Tongue

customer_reviews.title: Runs long.
customer_reviews.text: My sixteen year old son has had one of these in red for a couple of years and it is still in excellent condition in spite of belonging to a sixteen year old, active boy. He's six feet tall but very thin and finds the small to be long enough for his frame. And, "long enough" is a big issue for him.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lee Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, not baggy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a T shirt size Large athletic build 5'11" 190. However based on reviews I ordered a medium. Fits great. Shirt seems to have a tapered or cut fit witch is exactly what I was looking for. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Some stitching came out after first wash. Kinda sucks as I expected a better product from Under Armour. The vender shipped quick.
customer_reviews.author: TJK

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirts
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shirts. Very comfortable and a bit heavier than the typical "dry fabric" shirts, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful....but
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shirt, but a bit tight. Unfortunately cannot exchange as the tags were removed before I could exchange it. Kind of bummed as my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Once a Marine Always a Marine

customer_reviews.title: Available in tall sizes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shirt...perfect fit. I'm 6'-5" and am happy it'e available in tall sizes
customer_reviews.author: JiminGA

customer_reviews.title: Great polo at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great polo at a great price. Doesn't get nearly as hot as traditional cotton or pique polo's. I own about 5 of these in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: This really is not true to size. The Tall size is nice, but it is a full size smaller than expected. The XL fits like a large.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Great polo
customer_reviews.text: I love this polo and so does my husband. Bought it as a bday gift. The color is great and can’t beat the quality. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: The tall size is too long; Larry Bird could not fill this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’2” with a long torso and long arms. I like to order tall when it’s a option because the tall adds the necessary length in both the sleeves ands torso... I think the regular must be pretty long already as the shirt is so long I pretty sure Larry Bird could not fill this shirt. If you are 7 foot, go for the tall, or if you like wearing a man dress this is the shirt for you.
customer_reviews.author: 10thMTNDM

customer_reviews.title: UNDER ARMOR
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Shirts and Brands... I have to say that of all of them UNDER ARMOUR never disappoints. This shirt fits well and the material is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A bit looser fit around torso - arms/chest was fine
customer_reviews.text: I love the embroidered text and logo. The chest and shoulder fit was fine, but it is a looser fit around the belly. The quality was exceptional and the polo is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: ChazTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great cool shirts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to have different colors to wear. They are great. They really do keep me cool in the hot weather. And, they look great, too.
customer_reviews.author: doc hop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear the Nike Dri Fit polos until the became impossible to find. These are a little heavier, but are even better. I went a size up, but could have gotten my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and keeps dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shirt. I wear it golfing and even when it’s over 90 outside I’m still able to stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: M Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shirt. It is from their more premier line. Good value on Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby R Carter Jr

customer_reviews.title: Weird stitching location
customer_reviews.text: This polo has horizontal stitching that goes right across the back of the shoulders, and it makes no sense and is uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gators33

customer_reviews.title: Base Layer or Polo Shirt ?
customer_reviews.text: shirts material is good .... loose fit it is not , fits more like a base underlayer .... sleeves a bit short not something I would feel comfy in for a round of golf
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are much too short, would return but have missed return deadline, if you don't like sleeves too short don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: G Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: UA instead of "N"
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great performance, and less cost than the "N" brand.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Wheelie

customer_reviews.title: Cool,and nice soft gray color!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light weight. Soft gray color. Washes nice in a better bag doesn’t wrinkle much at all in one. Line drys perfectly. Has survived many washings so far.
customer_reviews.author: amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and is awesome material
customer_reviews.text: Typical Under Armour Quality. Fits great and is awesome material. I am 6' 4" and ordered a XL. It is unlike most XL shirts I buy in that it has a perfect length, and is not overly wide. Spend the extra money and get a shirt that fits great and is made to last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The wrinkles from being folded wouldn’t come out; I washed it and nothing happened; i steamed it and some wrinkles relaxed. Then a hole began on the side. Disappointed in Under armour usual high quality.
customer_reviews.author: joan kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is pricey, but the quality is excellent. And, of course, it is very comfortable to wear. Remember to not throw these shirts in the dryer and they will last you forever.
customer_reviews.author: Gavaronee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt
customer_reviews.text: Awesome polo, fits great across the chest and arms, so comfortable, highly recommend. I have bought 7 of these of different colors in the past year.
customer_reviews.author: zacharia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shirt for my Fiance and he loves it!! The fit was perfect. Exactly as pictured. The quality is fabulous!! Some reviews talk about it being long, but it's just right. My Fiance is 5"9' and it's not too long on him.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Needed a nice looking light shirt to be outside in the sun for a long time. This was a great choice! It is Under Armour so I expected it to be a very good shirt, and it definitely is. I wish they weren't so eexpensiv, I'd have many more of these. I guess that's what happens when that logo gets slapped on the front though.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt but they run a little bit bigger than the size stated.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, but the size is a bit larger than stated. I normally wear a Large and can wear the medium on this shirt. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: FlyBoy777

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Good shirt. Wish the sleeves were maybe 2 inches shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Clark

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour is my fiancé's favorite brand because it fits so well
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour is my fiancé's favorite brand because it fits so well! He is about 6'1" with very broad shoulders and a thin waist and the large shirt fits him very well. The material is great for the summer time and it has a very polished look.
customer_reviews.author: fvalentino

customer_reviews.title: was not happy to see shirt made in third world country an ...
customer_reviews.text: was not happy to see shirt made in third world country an logos are stitched on with scrap material an the logo on back right shoulder makes me not want to wear the shirt because it rubs an is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: dextervance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shirt for bigger men
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6ft, 300 lbs and I purchased a black 3xL for him and it fits great. Normally he wears a 2X in most other shirts but we have found underarmor tends to run a size smaller in the chest and arms. It is a loose fit but not to the point it looks sloppy and with him being a bigger guy, he doesn't like a slim fit anything. Shirt is comfortable for golf, dinner etc. I will be buying more colors for him in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jnetkathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very cool polo shirt. Nice style. Exelent feel. Cooler for hot summer days
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and love that design shirt. it feel so soft .
customer_reviews.author: Denny Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... - it breathes well and I think it fits nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt does exactly what you'd want from an Under Armour polo - it breathes well and I think it fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These polo shirts have worked out wonderful for casual days at work when I still wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: These polo shirts have worked out wonderful for casual days at work when I still wanted to look sharp but be comfortable. (I'm 6'1 and 205 and the large fits me well). As many of you already know, it can be a guessing game trying to find the right size (e.g. L vs. XL).
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: construction wash and wear
customer_reviews.text: This shirt washes as wears great.. My husband is a construction supervisor and has to look good for meeting and still is in the field with the crews..
customer_reviews.author: cynthia price

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, lays good across shoulders and does not flare outward at waist.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made shirt that fit as expected. I will be purchasing additional shirts
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z.

customer_reviews.title: My husband favorite shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Cooling, great for casual or work wear, washes beautifully, doesnt wrinkle!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Geraldo

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was very much undersized and could not wear it. Nowhere near a men’s XL golf shirt
customer_reviews.author: Monte A. Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. Very beatable and wicks the sweat away during the hot summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Shirt fits well
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fits perfect. High quality. Very light and breathable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the fabric and a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was odd. It showed nipples through it even with a tee shirt on. I've never bought UnderArmour so Maybe the fabric is the same with all their clothes. The vendor was great. On time and very helpful even through my return.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ringuest

customer_reviews.title: The shirt quality is good but be aware this is a tight form fitting ...
customer_reviews.text: The shirt quality is good but be aware this is a tight form fitting design even though it says loose.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Stains all over Under Armour shirt
customer_reviews.text: There’s a stain on the back side of collar and more stains on the front.
customer_reviews.author: snackalot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that the under armor signs doesn’t show up
customer_reviews.author: Ronald w.

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable polo that I own
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable polo that I own. I am a tall guy and it has generous length.
customer_reviews.author: Kramer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Well liked by the recipient of this shirt. It was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky's mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is awesome and the fit is right on.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt. Good color and comfortable. We will buy more in different colors for variety.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Loose Fit - great for golf for bigger guys.
customer_reviews.text: Does fit LOOSE. I am a big buy, 5'11 and about 300 pounds. This fits LOOSE, but not so loose as to be a dress. I have love handles, this hides them well, at the expense of fitting a bit looser around my chest. I figure its a trade off for being a bit larger unfortunately. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this for Father's Day! He loves it! He is a size XL and the XL fits him perfectly! It is his go-to golf shirt. :-)
customer_reviews.author: MelK

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts for golf or casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Love these shirts for wearing to work or casual on the weekends. Even in the Arizona sun the material keeps you pretty cool and comfortable. I ordered more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Fabric was likely melted by a heat gun used to seal package(?)
customer_reviews.text: There are four large burn/melted fabric marks on the shirt!!! I suspect it is from a heat gun that was used to seal the package. I am going on a vacation next Wednesday and needed a new shirt! :) Please send replacement Asap
customer_reviews.author: charles scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt for the price. My husband looks very charming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk that falls apart in first few months.
customer_reviews.text: Collar of shirt fell apart quickly in first few months. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MikeK

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Under Armour fabric, color and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Under Armour fabric, color and fit! Husband loves UA clothing for outdoor sports, golf, etc.! This one also has the UPF 30 UV rays protection, moisture wicking - for hot summer days! A keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, looks sharp....but so hard to get wrinkles out! Not wrinkle free!
customer_reviews.author: Sacia A. Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Too "Loose fit"!
customer_reviews.text: The material looks good but it is a "loose fit" which means that it is really very loose. My mistake because i did not observe this aspect in product description. It doesn't fit at all as on the model in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: nicolau marian

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of these shirts and this is just as great. UA changed their sizing then again so did I...Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt. But just be aware Under Armour fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. But just be aware Under Armour fits small. If your an XL normally In Under Armour your an XXL and so on. I wish they would fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rosenblatt

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. I have a more muscular build and have a hard time finding the right fit with golf polos. Good quality golf shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: not up to standards this time
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Under Armour polos. This one seemed to have been sewed wrong. Not really satisfied with this one only. Normally great fit and great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Aysia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 1 wear the tshirt had several thread pulls and looked very old.
customer_reviews.author: Cheezygr

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is my husband's new Favorite for work. The fit was perfect and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: UA Polos are so nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I just keep buying them when a new color in my side becomes available
customer_reviews.author: Travis Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Fits an the small side but I need to lose weight any way. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Vicki Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the picture.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the picture looks like its made of cotton but its like the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Performance Polo
product_meta.description: Smooth, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a cleaner, snag-free finish . 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast . Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. UPF 30 protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays. Durable rib-knit collar. Performance fit.
feature_bullets: Smooth, soft anti-pick, anti-pill fabric has a cleaner, snag-free finish
4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes
UPF 30 protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays
